short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your all in one tool for detailed SEO Meta analysis. Get detailed, comprehensive insights with our powerful side panel tool.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Meta SEO Viewer is a powerful Chrome extension that serves as your all in one SEO Meta analysis solution. This comprehensive tool helps you analyze web page content directly from your browser, providing detailed SEO Meta insights through a convenient side panel.

🚀Comprehensive SEO Meta Analysis
With Meta SEO Viewer, you can quickly access important SEO information and gain valuable insights into any webpage you visit. This all in one tool offers a detailed SEO Meta analysis, covering various aspects of on-page optimization.

🚀Features
- View detailed metadata information
- Analyze page headings structure
- Identify and count keywords
- Examine schema markup

🚀How it works
- Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store
- Click on the extension icon to open the side panel
- Browse any website to see real-time, detailed SEO Meta analysis

🚀Feature breakdown
⭐Metadata Viewer
- Displays crucial metadata such as title, description, canonical URL, and more
- Shows Open Graph and Twitter Card metadata
- Provides information on robots meta tags and language settings

⭐Heading Structure Analysis
- Presents a hierarchical view of the page's headings (H1 to H6)
- Allows for easy navigation through the page structure
- Helps identify potential SEO improvements in content organization

⭐Keyword Analysis
- Identifies and counts frequently used words and phrases
- Excludes common stop words for more accurate results
- Presents keywords in an easy-to-read bubble format with occurrence counts

⭐Schema Markup Inspection
- Detects and displays structured data used on the page
- Summarizes schema types and properties
- Helps ensure proper implementation of rich snippets

🚀Technical Details
-Uses Manifest V3 for improved performance and security
- Implements a side panel for a non-intrusive user experience
- Utilizes content scripts to analyze page data in real-time

🚀Privacy and Permissions
- Requires access to active tab and scripting permissions
- Does not collect or store any user data
- All analysis is performed locally in your browser

🚀About SuperIntent.IO
SuperIntent.IO is committed to developing tools that empower web professionals and SEO enthusiasts. Our goal is to make SEO analysis accessible and efficient for everyone.

🚀Feedback and Support
We value your input! If you have any questions, suggestions, or encounter any issues, please don't hesitate to contact our support team through the official website or the Chrome Web Store listing.

Supercharge your SEO analysis with Meta SEO Viewer - Your all in one, detailed SEO Meta assistant in the browser!
